name: 10 Snekonds
description:
You’re an operator of high-tech, bleeding edge linear swarm of multi-purpose robotic vehicles, commonly referred to as “Snake”.

Usually driving this thing is fun, but a mysterious Pyramid is shooting at you every 10 seconds, forcing your last vehicle to detach and misbehave. Frankly, this makes it even more fun somehow, but you still need to win!

  • CONTROLS: Arrow keys, Z
  • Read the in-game tutorial
Known Issues
  • Works best in Chrome
  • May lag if not Full-screen
